John Darley

Lacrosse Bio
  • 2008 – Present – Director of Operations – Lax 4 Life Summer and Fall Leagues
  • 2010 – Present – Director of Operations – Southern Rage Travel Club
  • 2008 – 2011 – Seminole Elite HS Lax Maniax Head Coach – Regional Travel Team
  • 2008 – 2010 – 2011 – 2012 – U.S. Lacrosse Florida National First Team Head Coach
  • 2008 – Present – Head Coach, Women’s Varsity Lacrosse – Oviedo High School
  • 2007 – Present – Board Member USLO – Orlando Chapter
  • 2004 – 2007 – Assistant Coach, Women’s Varsity Lacrosse – Oviedo High School
Player Development
  • Coached 5 High School All Americans – 2004 / 2012
  • 40 plus All Conference Award Winners – 2004 / 2012
  • 60 plus Academic All Americans – 2004 / 2012
  • 6 First Team All Central Florida Award Winners – 2008 – 2012
Team Accomplishments
  • 2009 – 2012 – Runner up – District Championship
  • 2008 – State Championship Semi-Finalist
  • 2008 – District and Regional Champions
  • 2008 – District Title
  • 2005 – District Title

Coach Darley is a native Marylander who grew up playing lacrosse and basketball.  His positive approach to coaching and his enthusiasm for the game of Lacrosse has proven to be a formula for success at Oviedo High School.

Other Lax activities: Director of Operations – Southern Shootout Lacrosse Tournaments – High school and youth league players
